item.title: Trying K3s on ARM
item.description:
Why k3s and not stick with k8s?

I wanted to experiment with k3s. They package everything you need in a single binary, don’t package in deprecated parts of k8s, and it works on ARMv7 and ARM64. It seemed like it’d be a less painful way to get Kubernetes on my ARM cluster.
